localize.text: Mankind has wanted to build a fertile world for a long time.
But what does fertile mean to them?
Is it worthy of all the conflict and pain?
Numerous stories have begun and vanished.
During that process, people started to lose faith.
Looking at them, some saw despair, while others saw hope.
At a certain moment, a new civilization was born.
Many changes were made with unbelievable speed.
Along with new technologies being discovered.
All of the Wings hold at least one Singularity.
That’s right, like the first humans wanted, the technologies were intended to create a fertile world.
Causing an unimaginable sight to unfold.
If all that turned everything fertile, we simply don't know.
One thing is certain; it is what enabled me to speak in front of you.
